thread.title: Trench, the remake of Trenchermen, opens Wednesday - Chicago Tribune
thread.title_full: Trench, the remake of Trenchermen, opens Wednesday - Chicago Tribune

author: Phil Vettel
title: Trench, the remake of Trenchermen, opens Wednesday - Chicago Tribune
text:
Trench, the remake of Trenchermen, opens Wednesday Trench 
Trench, the Trenchermen remake, opens Wednesday. 
Trench, the Trenchermen remake, opens Wednesday. (Huge Galdones / Galdones Photography) Phil Vettel of Trenchermen restaurant, chef Jared Wentworth (Longman & Eagle) said he hoped to reopen the restaurant, which closed at the end of 2016, by "late January or early February."
Nailed it. 
Trench, as it's now known, will reopen Wednesday. 
Look for some decor tweaks, a new menu ("comfort food with technique and progressiveness," Wentworth calls it) and a bar program by beverage manager Michael McAvena that will include classic cocktails and chalkboard specials. 
Trench, 2039 W. North Ave., 773-661-1540, www.trenchbar.com 
Phil Vettel is a Tribune critic. 
pvettel@chicagotribune.comTwitter @philvettel 
First, we found the best hot chocolate in Chicago . Now, we track down the city's best chocolate cake, from chocolate tres leches cake to 23-layer insanity. 
Restaurant critic Phil Vettel and colleagues reflect on the best dishes and drinks they had in Chicago restaurants and bars this year.
